    7359              :                           "IMF profiles require precision of each component to b in [8-16] bits unsigned"
    7360              :                           "-> At least component %d of input image (%d bits, %s) is not compliant\n"
    7361              :                           "-> Non-IMF codestream will be generated\n",
    7362              :                           i, image->comps[i].prec, tmp_str);
    7363            0 :             ret = OPJ_FALSE;
    7364              :         }
    7365              :     }
    7366              : 
    7367              :     /* Sub-sampling */
    7368            0 :     for (i = 0; i < image->numcomps; i++) {
    7369            0 :         if (i == 0 && image->comps[i].dx != 1) {
    7370            0 :             opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_WARNING,
    7371              :                           "IMF profiles require XRSiz1 == 1. Here it is set to %d.\n"
    7372              :                           "-> Non-IMF codestream will be generated\n",
    7373              :                           image->comps[i].dx);
    7374            0 :             ret = OPJ_FALSE;
    7375              :         }
    7376            0 :         if (i == 1 && image->comps[i].dx != 1 && image->comps[i].dx != 2) {
    7377            0 :             opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_WARNING,
    7378              :                           "IMF profiles require XRSiz2 == 1 or 2. Here it is set to %d.\n"
    7379              :                           "-> Non-IMF codestream will be generated\n",
    7380              :                           image->comps[i].dx);
    7381            0 :             ret = OPJ_FALSE;
    7382              :         }
    7383            0 :         if (i > 1 && image->comps[i].dx != image->comps[i - 1].dx) {
    7384            0 :             opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_WARNING,
    7385              :                           "IMF profiles require XRSiz%d to be the same as XRSiz2. "
    7386              :                           "Here it is set to %d instead of %d.\n"
    7387              :                           "-> Non-IMF codestream will be generated\n",
    7388              :                           i + 1, image->comps[i].dx, image->comps[i - 1].dx);
    7389            0 :             ret = OPJ_FALSE;
    7390              :         }

    7397            0 :             ret = OPJ_FALSE;

    7402            0 :     switch (profile) {

    7404              :     case OPJ_PROFILE_IMF_2K_R:
    7405            0 :         if (((image->comps[0].w > 2048) | (image->comps[0].h > 1556))) {

    7430            0 :             opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_WARNING,
    7431              :                           "IMF 8K/8K_R profile require:\n"
    7432              :                           "width <= 8192 and height <= 6224\n"
    7433              :                           "-> Input image size %d x %d is not compliant\n"
    7434              :                           "-> Non-IMF codestream will be generated\n",
    7435              :                           image->comps[0].w, image->comps[0].h);
    7436            0 :             ret = OPJ_FALSE;
    7437              :         }
    7438              :         break;
    7439              :     default :
    7440              :         assert(0);
    7441              :         return OPJ_FALSE;
    7442              :     }
    7443              : 
    7444            0 :     if (parameters->roi_compno != -1) {

    7447              :                       "-> Compression parameters specify a ROI\n"
    7448              :                       "-> Non-IMF codestream will be generated\n");
    7449            0 :         ret = OPJ_FALSE;
    7450              :     }
    7451              : 
    7452            0 :     if (parameters->cblockw_init != 32 || parameters->cblockh_init != 32) {
    7453            0 :         opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_WARNING,

    7455              :                       "-> Compression parameters set it to %dx%d.\n"

    7457              :                       parameters->cblockw_init,
    7458              :                       parameters->cblockh_init);
    7459            0 :         ret = OPJ_FALSE;
    7460              :     }
    7461              : 
    7462            0 :     if (parameters->prog_order != OPJ_CPRL) {
    7463            0 :         opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_WARNING,
    7464              :                       "IMF profile require progression order to be CPRL.\n"
    7465              :                       "-> Compression parameters set it to %d.\n"
    7466              :                       "-> Non-IMF codestream will be generated\n",
    7467              :                       parameters->prog_order);
    7468            0 :         ret = OPJ_FALSE;
    7469              :     }
    7470              : 
    7471            0 :     if (parameters->numpocs != 0) {
    7472            0 :         opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_WARNING,
    7473              :                       "IMF profile forbid POC markers.\n"
    7474              :                       "-> Compression parameters set %d POC.\n"
    7475              :                       "-> Non-IMF codestream will be generated\n",
    7476              :                       parameters->numpocs);
    7477            0 :         ret = OPJ_FALSE;
    7478              :     }
    7479              : 
    7480              :     /* Codeblock style: no mode switch enabled */
    7481            0 :     if (parameters->mode != 0) {
    7482            0 :         opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_WARNING,
    7483              :                       "IMF profile forbid mode switch in code block style.\n"
    7484              :                       "-> Compression parameters set code block style to %d.\n"
    7485              :                       "-> Non-IMF codestream will be generated\n",
    7486              :                       parameters->mode);
    7487            0 :         ret = OPJ_FALSE;
    7488              :     }
    7489              :

    7679            0 : OPJ_BOOL opj_j2k_setup_encoder(opj_j2k_t *p_j2k,

    7697            0 :         return OPJ_FALSE;
    7698              :     }
    7699              :

    7875              :     /* see if max_codestream_size does limit input rate */

    7884            0 :                 parameters->max_cs_size = INT_MAX;

    7887              :             }

    7898            0 :                                        image->comps[0].h * image->comps[0].prec) /

    8891              : /** Fill p_j2k->cstr_index->tp_index[].start_pos/end_pos fields from TLM marker segments */

    8906            0 :         l_tlm->m_is_invalid = OPJ_TRUE;
    8907            0 :         return;

    8909              : 
    8910            0 :     if (l_tlm->m_is_invalid) {

    8912              :     }

    8929              :         }

    8972            0 : static OPJ_BOOL opj_j2k_read_header_procedure(opj_j2k_t *p_j2k,
    8973              :         opj_stream_private_t *p_stream,
    8974              :         opj_event_mgr_t * p_manager)
    8975              : {
    8976            0 :     OPJ_UINT32 l_current_marker;
    8977            0 :     OPJ_UINT32 l_marker_size;
    8978            0 :     const opj_dec_memory_marker_handler_t * l_marker_handler = 00;
    8979            0 :     OPJ_BOOL l_has_siz = 0;
    8980            0 :     OPJ_BOOL l_has_cod = 0;
    8981            0 :     OPJ_BOOL l_has_qcd = 0;
    8982              : 
    8983              :     /* preconditions */
    8984            0 :     assert(p_stream != 00);
    8985            0 :     assert(p_j2k != 00);
    8986            0 :     assert(p_manager != 00);
    8987              : 
    8988              :     /*  We enter in the main header */
    8989            0 :     p_j2k->m_specific_param.m_decoder.m_state = J2K_STATE_MHSOC;
    8990              : 
    8991              :     /* Try to read the SOC marker, the codestream must begin with SOC marker */
    8992            0 :     if (! opj_j2k_read_soc(p_j2k, p_stream, p_manager)) {
    8993            0 :         opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_ERROR, "Expected a SOC marker \n");
    8994            0 :         return OPJ_FALSE;
    8995              :     }
    8996              : 
    8997              :     /* Try to read 2 bytes (the next marker ID) from stream and copy them into the buffer */
    8998            0 :     if (opj_stream_read_data(p_stream,
    8999              :                              p_j2k->m_specific_param.m_decoder.m_header_data, 2, p_manager) != 2) {
    9000            0 :         opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_ERROR, "Stream too short\n");
    9001            0 :         return OPJ_FALSE;
    9002              :     }
    9003              : 
    9004              :     /* Read 2 bytes as the new marker ID */
    9005            0 :     opj_read_bytes(p_j2k->m_specific_param.m_decoder.m_header_data,
    9006              :                    &l_current_marker, 2);
    9007              : 
    9008              :     /* Try to read until the SOT is detected */
    9009            0 :     while (l_current_marker != J2K_MS_SOT) {
    9010              : 
    9011              :         /* Check if the current marker ID is valid */
    9012            0 :         if (l_current_marker < 0xff00) {
    9013            0 :             opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_ERROR,
    9014              :                           "A marker ID was expected (0xff--) instead of %.8x\n", l_current_marker);
    9015            0 :             return OPJ_FALSE;
    9016              :         }
    9017              : 
    9018              :         /* Get the marker handler from the marker ID */
    9019            0 :         l_marker_handler = opj_j2k_get_marker_handler(l_current_marker);
    9020              : 
    9021              :         /* Manage case where marker is unknown */
    9022            0 :         if (l_marker_handler->id == J2K_MS_UNK) {
    9023            0 :             if (! opj_j2k_read_unk(p_j2k, p_stream, &l_current_marker, p_manager)) {
    9024            0 :                 opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_ERROR,
    9025              :                               "Unknown marker has been detected and generated error.\n");
    9026            0 :                 return OPJ_FALSE;
    9027              :             }
    9028              : 
    9029            0 :             if (l_current_marker == J2K_MS_SOT) {
    9030              :                 break;    /* SOT marker is detected main header is completely read */
    9031              :             } else { /* Get the marker handler from the marker ID */
    9032            0 :                 l_marker_handler = opj_j2k_get_marker_handler(l_current_marker);
    9033              :             }
    9034              :         }
    9035              : 
    9036            0 :         if (l_marker_handler->id == J2K_MS_SIZ) {
    9037              :             /* Mark required SIZ marker as found */
    9038            0 :             l_has_siz = 1;
    9039              :         }
    9040            0 :         if (l_marker_handler->id == J2K_MS_COD) {
    9041              :             /* Mark required COD marker as found */
    9042            0 :             l_has_cod = 1;
    9043              :         }
    9044            0 :         if (l_marker_handler->id == J2K_MS_QCD) {
    9045              :             /* Mark required QCD marker as found */
    9046            0 :             l_has_qcd = 1;
    9047              :         }
    9048              : 
    9049              :         /* Check if the marker is known and if it is the right place to find it */
    9050            0 :         if (!(p_j2k->m_specific_param.m_decoder.m_state & l_marker_handler->states)) {
    9051            0 :             opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_ERROR,
    9052              :                           "Marker is not compliant with its position\n");
    9053            0 :             return OPJ_FALSE;
    9054              :         }
    9055              : 
    9056              :         /* Try to read 2 bytes (the marker size) from stream and copy them into the buffer */
    9057            0 :         if (opj_stream_read_data(p_stream,
    9058              :                                  p_j2k->m_specific_param.m_decoder.m_header_data, 2, p_manager) != 2) {
    9059            0 :             opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_ERROR, "Stream too short\n");
    9060            0 :             return OPJ_FALSE;
    9061              :         }
    9062              : 
    9063              :         /* read 2 bytes as the marker size */
    9064            0 :         opj_read_bytes(p_j2k->m_specific_param.m_decoder.m_header_data, &l_marker_size,
    9065              :                        2);
    9066            0 :         if (l_marker_size < 2) {
    9067            0 :             opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_ERROR, "Invalid marker size\n");
    9068            0 :             return OPJ_FALSE;
    9069              :         }
    9070            0 :         l_marker_size -= 2; /* Subtract the size of the marker ID already read */
    9071              : 
    9072              :         /* Check if the marker size is compatible with the header data size */
    9073            0 :         if (l_marker_size > p_j2k->m_specific_param.m_decoder.m_header_data_size) {
    9074            0 :             OPJ_BYTE *new_header_data = (OPJ_BYTE *) opj_realloc(
    9075            0 :                                             p_j2k->m_specific_param.m_decoder.m_header_data, l_marker_size);
    9076            0 :             if (! new_header_data) {
    9077            0 :                 opj_free(p_j2k->m_specific_param.m_decoder.m_header_data);
    9078            0 :                 p_j2k->m_specific_param.m_decoder.m_header_data = NULL;
    9079            0 :                 p_j2k->m_specific_param.m_decoder.m_header_data_size = 0;
    9080            0 :                 opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_ERROR, "Not enough memory to read header\n");
    9081            0 :                 return OPJ_FALSE;
    9082              :             }
    9083            0 :             p_j2k->m_specific_param.m_decoder.m_header_data = new_header_data;
    9084            0 :             p_j2k->m_specific_param.m_decoder.m_header_data_size = l_marker_size;
    9085              :         }
    9086              : 
    9087              :         /* Try to read the rest of the marker segment from stream and copy them into the buffer */
    9088            0 :         if (opj_stream_read_data(p_stream,
    9089              :                                  p_j2k->m_specific_param.m_decoder.m_header_data, l_marker_size,
    9090            0 :                                  p_manager) != l_marker_size) {
    9091            0 :             opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_ERROR, "Stream too short\n");
    9092            0 :             return OPJ_FALSE;
    9093              :         }
    9094              : 
    9095              :         /* Read the marker segment with the correct marker handler */
    9096            0 :         if (!(*(l_marker_handler->handler))(p_j2k,
    9097              :                                             p_j2k->m_specific_param.m_decoder.m_header_data, l_marker_size, p_manager)) {
    9098            0 :             opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_ERROR,
    9099              :                           "Marker handler function failed to read the marker segment\n");

    9468            0 : static void opj_j2k_tcp_destroy(opj_tcp_t *p_tcp)

    9472              :     }
    9473              :

   10428            0 : static OPJ_BOOL opj_j2k_update_image_dimensions(opj_image_t* p_image,
   10429              :         opj_event_mgr_t * p_manager)
   10430              : {
   10431            0 :     OPJ_UINT32 it_comp;
   10432            0 :     OPJ_INT32 l_comp_x1, l_comp_y1;
   10433            0 :     opj_image_comp_t* l_img_comp = NULL;
   10434              : 
   10435            0 :     l_img_comp = p_image->comps;

   10437            0 :         OPJ_INT32 l_h, l_w;

   10439            0 :                 p_image->y0 > (OPJ_UINT32)INT_MAX ||
   10440            0 :                 p_image->x1 > (OPJ_UINT32)INT_MAX ||
   10441            0 :                 p_image->y1 > (OPJ_UINT32)INT_MAX) {
   10442            0 :             opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_ERROR,
   10443              :                           "Image coordinates above INT_MAX are not supported\n");
   10444            0 :             return OPJ_FALSE;
   10445              :         }
   10446              :

   10459              :         }

   10478            0 : OPJ_BOOL opj_j2k_set_decoded_components(opj_j2k_t *p_j2k,
   10479              :                                         OPJ_UINT32 numcomps,
   10480              :                                         const OPJ_UINT32* comps_indices,
   10481              :                                         opj_event_mgr_t * p_manager)

   10538            0 : OPJ_BOOL opj_j2k_set_decode_area(opj_j2k_t *p_j2k,

   10552              :         /* ingested, go on */
   10553              :     }
   10554              :     /* Check if we are read the main header */

   10931            0 : static OPJ_BOOL opj_j2k_read_SPCod_SPCoc(opj_j2k_t *p_j2k,
   10932              :         OPJ_UINT32 compno,
   10933              :         OPJ_BYTE * p_header_data,
   10934              :         OPJ_UINT32 * p_header_size,
   10935              :         opj_event_mgr_t * p_manager)
   10936              : {
   10937            0 :     OPJ_UINT32 i, l_tmp;
   10938            0 :     opj_cp_t *l_cp = NULL;
   10939            0 :     opj_tcp_t *l_tcp = NULL;
   10940            0 :     opj_tccp_t *l_tccp = NULL;
   10941            0 :     OPJ_BYTE * l_current_ptr = NULL;
   10942              : 
   10943              :     /* preconditions */
   10944            0 :     assert(p_j2k != 00);
   10945            0 :     assert(p_manager != 00);
   10946            0 :     assert(p_header_data != 00);
   10947              : 
   10948            0 :     l_cp = &(p_j2k->m_cp);

   10950            0 :             &l_cp->tcps[p_j2k->m_current_tile_number] :
   10951              :             p_j2k->m_specific_param.m_decoder.m_default_tcp;
   10952              : 
   10953              :     /* precondition again */
   10954            0 :     assert(compno < p_j2k->m_private_image->numcomps);
   10955              : 
   10956            0 :     l_tccp = &l_tcp->tccps[compno];
   10957            0 :     l_current_ptr = p_header_data;
   10958              : 
   10959              :     /* make sure room is sufficient */
   10960            0 :     if (*p_header_size < 5) {
   10961            0 :         opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_ERROR, "Error reading SPCod SPCoc element\n");
   10962            0 :         return OPJ_FALSE;
   10963              :     }
   10964              : 
   10965              :     /* SPcod (D) / SPcoc (A) */
   10966            0 :     opj_read_bytes(l_current_ptr, &l_tccp->numresolutions, 1);
   10967            0 :     ++l_tccp->numresolutions;  /* tccp->numresolutions = read() + 1 */

   10972            0 :         return OPJ_FALSE;
   10973              :     }
   10974            0 :     ++l_current_ptr;
   10975              : 
   10976              :     /* If user wants to remove more resolutions than the codestream contains, return error */

   10980              :                       "to remove (%d) is greater or equal than the number "

   10984              :             0x8000;/* FIXME J2K_DEC_STATE_ERR;*/
   10985            0 :         return OPJ_FALSE;
   10986              :     }
   10987              : 
   10988              :     /* SPcod (E) / SPcoc (B) */
   10989            0 :     opj_read_bytes(l_current_ptr, &l_tccp->cblkw, 1);
   10990            0 :     ++l_current_ptr;
   10991            0 :     l_tccp->cblkw += 2;
   10992              : 
   10993              :     /* SPcod (F) / SPcoc (C) */
   10994            0 :     opj_read_bytes(l_current_ptr, &l_tccp->cblkh, 1);
   10995            0 :     ++l_current_ptr;
   10996            0 :     l_tccp->cblkh += 2;
   10997              : 
   10998            0 :     if ((l_tccp->cblkw > 10) || (l_tccp->cblkh > 10) ||
   10999            0 :             ((l_tccp->cblkw + l_tccp->cblkh) > 12)) {
   11000            0 :         opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_ERROR,
   11001              :                       "Error reading SPCod SPCoc element, Invalid cblkw/cblkh combination\n");
   11002            0 :         return OPJ_FALSE;
   11003              :     }
   11004              : 
   11005              :     /* SPcod (G) / SPcoc (D) */
   11006            0 :     opj_read_bytes(l_current_ptr, &l_tccp->cblksty, 1);
   11007            0 :     ++l_current_ptr;
   11008            0 :     if ((l_tccp->cblksty & J2K_CCP_CBLKSTY_HTMIXED) != 0) {
   11009              :         /* We do not support HT mixed mode yet.  For conformance, it should be supported.*/
   11010            0 :         opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_ERROR,
   11011              :                       "Error reading SPCod SPCoc element. Unsupported Mixed HT code-block style found\n");
   11012            0 :         return OPJ_FALSE;
   11013              :     }
   11014              : 
   11015              :     /* SPcod (H) / SPcoc (E) */
   11016            0 :     opj_read_bytes(l_current_ptr, &l_tccp->qmfbid, 1);
   11017            0 :     ++l_current_ptr;
   11018              : 
   11019            0 :     if (l_tccp->qmfbid > 1) {
   11020            0 :         opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_ERROR,
   11021              :                       "Error reading SPCod SPCoc element, Invalid transformation found\n");
   11022            0 :         return OPJ_FALSE;
   11023              :     }
   11024              : 
   11025            0 :     *p_header_size = *p_header_size - 5;
   11026              : 
   11027              :     /* use custom precinct size ? */
   11028            0 :     if (l_tccp->csty & J2K_CCP_CSTY_PRT) {
   11029            0 :         if (*p_header_size < l_tccp->numresolutions) {
   11030            0 :             opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_ERROR, "Error reading SPCod SPCoc element\n");
   11031            0 :             return OPJ_FALSE;
   11032              :         }
   11033              : 
   11034              :         /* SPcod (I_i) / SPcoc (F_i) */
   11035            0 :         for (i = 0; i < l_tccp->numresolutions; ++i) {
   11036            0 :             opj_read_bytes(l_current_ptr, &l_tmp, 1);
   11037            0 :             ++l_current_ptr;
   11038              :             /* Precinct exponent 0 is only allowed for lowest resolution level (Table A.21) */
   11039            0 :             if ((i != 0) && (((l_tmp & 0xf) == 0) || ((l_tmp >> 4) == 0))) {
   11040            0 :                 opj_event_msg(p_manager, EVT_ERROR, "Invalid precinct size\n");
   11041            0 :                 return OPJ_FALSE;
   11042              :             }
   11043            0 :             l_tccp->prcw[i] = l_tmp & 0xf;
   11044            0 :             l_tccp->prch[i] = l_tmp >> 4;
   11045              :         }
   11046              : 
   11047            0 :         *p_header_size = *p_header_size - l_tccp->numresolutions;
   11048              :     } else {
   11049              :         /* set default size for the precinct width and height */
   11050            0 :         for (i = 0; i < l_tccp->numresolutions; ++i) {
   11051            0 :             l_tccp->prcw[i] = 15;
   11052            0 :             l_tccp->prch[i] = 15;
   11053              :         }
   11054              :     }
   11055              : 
   11056              : #ifdef WIP_REMOVE_MSD
   11057              :     /* INDEX >> */

   11059              :         OPJ_UINT32 l_data_size = l_tccp->numresolutions * sizeof(OPJ_UINT32);

   11271            0 : static OPJ_BOOL opj_j2k_read_SQcd_SQcc(opj_j2k_t *p_j2k,

   11375              :             }
   11376              :         }
   11377              :

   11380              :         }
   11381            0 :         *p_header_size = *p_header_size - 2 * l_num_band;
   11382              :     }
   11383              : 
   11384              :     /* Add Antonin : if scalar_derived -> compute other stepsizes */
   11385            0 :     if (l_tccp->qntsty == J2K_CCP_QNTSTY_SIQNT) {
   11386            0 :         for (l_band_no = 1; l_band_no < OPJ_J2K_MAXBANDS; l_band_no++) {
   11387            0 :             l_tccp->stepsizes[l_band_no].expn =

   11392              :         }
   11393              :     }
   11394              : 
   11395              :     return OPJ_TRUE;
   11396              : }
   11397              : 
   11398            0 : static void opj_j2k_copy_tile_quantization_parameters(opj_j2k_t *p_j2k)
   11399              : {
   11400            0 :     OPJ_UINT32 i;
   11401            0 :     opj_cp_t *l_cp = NULL;
   11402            0 :     opj_tcp_t *l_tcp = NULL;
   11403            0 :     opj_tccp_t *l_ref_tccp = NULL;
   11404            0 :     opj_tccp_t *l_copied_tccp = NULL;
   11405            0 :     OPJ_UINT32 l_size;
   11406              : 
   11407              :     /* preconditions */
   11408            0 :     assert(p_j2k != 00);
   11409              : 
   11410            0 :     l_cp = &(p_j2k->m_cp);
   11411            0 :     l_tcp = p_j2k->m_specific_param.m_decoder.m_state == J2K_STATE_TPH ?
   11412            0 :             &l_cp->tcps[p_j2k->m_current_tile_number] :
   11413              :             p_j2k->m_specific_param.m_decoder.m_default_tcp;
   11414              : 
   11415            0 :     l_ref_tccp = &l_tcp->tccps[0];
   11416            0 :     l_copied_tccp = l_ref_tccp + 1;
   11417            0 :     l_size = OPJ_J2K_MAXBANDS * sizeof(opj_stepsize_t);
   11418              : 
   11419            0 :     for (i = 1; i < p_j2k->m_private_image->numcomps; ++i) {
   11420            0 :         l_copied_tccp->qntsty = l_ref_tccp->qntsty;
   11421            0 :         l_copied_tccp->numgbits = l_ref_tccp->numgbits;
   11422            0 :         memcpy(l_copied_tccp->stepsizes, l_ref_tccp->stepsizes, l_size);

   11425            0 : }

   11427            0 : static void opj_j2k_dump_tile_info(opj_tcp_t * l_default_tile,

   11429              : {

   11480            0 : void j2k_dump(opj_j2k_t* p_j2k, OPJ_INT32 flag, FILE* out_stream)
   11481              : {
   11482              :     /* Check if the flag is compatible with j2k file*/
   11483            0 :     if ((flag & OPJ_JP2_INFO) || (flag & OPJ_JP2_IND)) {
   11484            0 :         fprintf(out_stream, "Wrong flag\n");
   11485            0 :         return;
   11486              :     }
   11487              : 
   11488              :     /* Dump the image_header */
   11489            0 :     if (flag & OPJ_IMG_INFO) {
   11490            0 :         if (p_j2k->m_private_image) {
   11491            0 :             j2k_dump_image_header(p_j2k->m_private_image, 0, out_stream);
   11492              :         }
   11493              :     }
   11494              : 
   11495              :     /* Dump the codestream info from main header */
   11496            0 :     if (flag & OPJ_J2K_MH_INFO) {
   11497            0 :         if (p_j2k->m_private_image) {
   11498            0 :             opj_j2k_dump_MH_info(p_j2k, out_stream);
   11499              :         }
   11500              :     }
   11501              :     /* Dump all tile/codestream info */
   11502            0 :     if (flag & OPJ_J2K_TCH_INFO) {
   11503            0 :         OPJ_UINT32 l_nb_tiles = p_j2k->m_cp.th * p_j2k->m_cp.tw;
   11504            0 :         OPJ_UINT32 i;
   11505            0 :         opj_tcp_t * l_tcp = p_j2k->m_cp.tcps;

   11507            0 :             for (i = 0; i < l_nb_tiles; ++i) {
   11508            0 :                 opj_j2k_dump_tile_info(l_tcp, (OPJ_INT32)p_j2k->m_private_image->numcomps,
   11509              :                                        out_stream);
   11510            0 :                 ++l_tcp;
   11511              :             }
   11512              :         }
   11513              :     }
   11514              : 
   11515              :     /* Dump the codestream info of the current tile */
   11516            0 :     if (flag & OPJ_J2K_TH_INFO) {
   11517              : 
   11518            0 :     }
   11519              : 
   11520              :     /* Dump the codestream index from main header */
   11521            0 :     if (flag & OPJ_J2K_MH_IND) {
   11522            0 :         opj_j2k_dump_MH_index(p_j2k, out_stream);

   11532            0 : static void opj_j2k_dump_MH_index(opj_j2k_t* p_j2k, FILE* out_stream)
   11533              : {

   11536              : 
   11537            0 :     fprintf(out_stream, "Codestream index from main header: {\n");

   11540              :             "\t Main header end position=%" PRIi64 "\n",

   11542              :

   11555              :

   11557              :

   11658              :

   11761            0 : opj_codestream_index_t* j2k_get_cstr_index(opj_j2k_t* p_j2k)
   11762              : {
   11763            0 :     opj_codestream_index_t* l_cstr_index = (opj_codestream_index_t*)

   11936            0 : static int CompareOffT(const void* a, const void* b)
   11937              : {
   11938            0 :     const OPJ_OFF_T offA = *(const OPJ_OFF_T*)a;
   11939            0 :     const OPJ_OFF_T offB = *(const OPJ_OFF_T*)b;
   11940            0 :     if (offA < offB) {
   11941              :         return -1;
   11942              :     }
   11943            0 :     if (offA == offB) {
   11944            0 :         return 0;
   11945              :     }
   11946              :     return 1;
   11947              : }

   12146              : /**
   12147              :  * Sets up the procedures to do on decoding data. Developers wanting to extend the library can add their own reading procedures.

   12165              : /*
   12166              :  * Read and decode one tile.

   12168            0 : static OPJ_BOOL opj_j2k_decode_one_tile(opj_j2k_t *p_j2k,
   12169              :                                         opj_stream_private_t *p_stream,
   12170              :                                         opj_event_mgr_t * p_manager)
   12171              : {
   12172            0 :     OPJ_BOOL l_go_on = OPJ_TRUE;

   12548            0 : OPJ_BOOL opj_j2k_set_decoded_resolution_factor(opj_j2k_t *p_j2k,

   12847            0 : static void opj_get_tile_dimensions(opj_image_t * l_image,
   12848              :                                     opj_tcd_tilecomp_t * l_tilec,
   12849              :                                     opj_image_comp_t * l_img_comp,
   12850              :                                     OPJ_UINT32* l_size_comp,
   12851              :                                     OPJ_UINT32* l_width,
   12852              :                                     OPJ_UINT32* l_height,
   12853              :                                     OPJ_UINT32* l_offset_x,
   12854              :                                     OPJ_UINT32* l_offset_y,
   12855              :                                     OPJ_UINT32* l_image_width,
   12856              :                                     OPJ_UINT32* l_stride,
   12857              :                                     OPJ_UINT32* l_tile_offset)
   12858              : {
   12859            0 :     OPJ_UINT32 l_remaining;
   12860            0 :     *l_size_comp = l_img_comp->prec >> 3; /* (/8) */
   12861            0 :     l_remaining = l_img_comp->prec & 7;  /* (%8) */

   12863            0 :         *l_size_comp += 1;
   12864              :     }
   12865              : 
   12866            0 :     if (*l_size_comp == 3) {
   12867            0 :         *l_size_comp = 4;
   12868              :     }
   12869              : 
   12870            0 :     *l_width  = (OPJ_UINT32)(l_tilec->x1 - l_tilec->x0);
   12871            0 :     *l_height = (OPJ_UINT32)(l_tilec->y1 - l_tilec->y0);
   12872            0 :     *l_offset_x = opj_uint_ceildiv(l_image->x0, l_img_comp->dx);
   12873            0 :     *l_offset_y = opj_uint_ceildiv(l_image->y0, l_img_comp->dy);
   12874            0 :     *l_image_width = opj_uint_ceildiv(l_image->x1 - l_image->x0, l_img_comp->dx);
   12875            0 :     *l_stride = *l_image_width - *l_width;
   12876            0 :     *l_tile_offset = ((OPJ_UINT32)l_tilec->x0 - *l_offset_x) + ((
   12877            0 :                          OPJ_UINT32)l_tilec->y0 - *l_offset_y) * *l_image_width;

   12879              : 
   12880            0 : static void opj_j2k_get_tile_data(opj_tcd_t * p_tcd, OPJ_BYTE * p_data)
   12881              : {
   12882            0 :     OPJ_UINT32 i, j, k = 0;
   12883              : 
   12884            0 :     for (i = 0; i < p_tcd->image->numcomps; ++i) {
   12885            0 :         opj_image_t * l_image =  p_tcd->image;

   12890              :                    l_image_width, l_stride, l_tile_offset;
   12891              : 
   12892            0 :         opj_get_tile_dimensions(l_image,
   12893              :                                 l_tilec,

   12895              :                                 &l_size_comp,
   12896              :                                 &l_width,
   12897              :                                 &l_height,
   12898              :                                 &l_offset_x,
   12899              :                                 &l_offset_y,
   12900              :                                 &l_image_width,
   12901              :                                 &l_stride,
   12902              :                                 &l_tile_offset);
   12903              : 
   12904            0 :         l_src_ptr = l_img_comp->data + l_tile_offset;
   12905              : 
   12906            0 :         switch (l_size_comp) {
   12907            0 :         case 1: {
   12908            0 :             OPJ_CHAR * l_dest_ptr = (OPJ_CHAR*) p_data;

   12910            0 :                 for (j = 0; j < l_height; ++j) {

   12912            0 :                         *(l_dest_ptr) = (OPJ_CHAR)(*l_src_ptr);

   12914            0 :                         ++l_src_ptr;
   12915              :                     }
   12916            0 :                     l_src_ptr += l_stride;
   12917              :                 }
   12918              :             } else {
   12919            0 :                 for (j = 0; j < l_height; ++j) {
   12920            0 :                     for (k = 0; k < l_width; ++k) {
   12921            0 :                         *(l_dest_ptr) = (OPJ_CHAR)((*l_src_ptr) & 0xff);
   12922            0 :                         ++l_dest_ptr;
   12923            0 :                         ++l_src_ptr;
   12924              :                     }
   12925            0 :                     l_src_ptr += l_stride;
   12926              :                 }
   12927              :             }
   12928              : 
   12929              :             p_data = (OPJ_BYTE*) l_dest_ptr;
   12930              :         }

   12932            0 :         case 2: {

   12945              :                     }
   12946            0 :                     l_src_ptr += l_stride;

   12948              :             }
   12949              :

   12951              :         }
   12952              :         break;

   12954              :             OPJ_INT32 * l_dest_ptr = (OPJ_INT32 *) p_data;

   12956            0 :                 for (k = 0; k < l_width; ++k) {

   12968              : 
   12969            0 : static OPJ_BOOL opj_j2k_post_write_tile(opj_j2k_t * p_j2k,
   12970              :                                         opj_stream_private_t *p_stream,
